basic_info.project_name: Statement of Work for provision of services Confidential
basic_info.brief_description: Provision of services for search infrastructure development

services_included.name: Search infrastructure development
services_included.description: Development of search infrastructure with APIs and user interface

how_service_meet_criterion.name: Data Analytics
how_service_meet_criterion.description: The Data Analytics service is distinct in nature as it involves the analysis of data to provide insights and recommendations. This service is separate from other services such as Consulting and Technology Solutions.

how_service_meet_criterion.name: Consulting
how_service_meet_criterion.description: The Consulting service is distinct in nature as it involves providing expert advice and guidance to the customer. This service is separate from other services such as Data Analytics and Technology Solutions.

how_service_meet_criterion.name: Technology Solutions
how_service_meet_criterion.description: The Technology Solutions service is distinct in nature as it involves the design, development, and implementation of technology solutions. This service is separate from other services such as Data Analytics and Consulting.

modifications_options.name: Withholding of 5% of the invoice
modifications_options.description: The customer has the option to withhold 5% of the invoice for the first month of the iteration. This modification affects the performance obligations as it impacts the revenue recognition.
modifications_options.impact_on_revenue: The withholding of 5% of the invoice will reduce the revenue recognized by the service provider in the first month of the iteration.

modifications_options.name: Payment terms
modifications_options.description: The payment terms of the contract specify that the customer will pay the full amount of the invoice and the withheld amount if the team has met its obligations within 10% deviation. This modification affects the performance obligations as it impacts the revenue recognition.
modifications_options.impact_on_revenue: The payment terms will impact the revenue recognized by the service provider as it depends on the team's performance and the customer's payment schedule.

total_transaction_price.amount_applicable_on_contract_date_inclu: The total transaction price for the contract is not explicitly stated in the contract. However, based on the services and deliverables listed, it can be inferred that the total transaction price will be based on the time and materials provided by the service provider.

details.name: Time and Materials
details.description: The compensation structure is based on a time and materials approach, where the service provider will charge the customer for the actual time and materials provided.

nature.name: Discounts
nature.estimation: The discounts will be estimated based on the customer's payment schedule and the service provider's performance.

details.description: Priorly approved in writing by Customer and will be charged to Customer on a passthrough basis.
Priorly approved in writing by Customer and will be charged to Customer on a passthrough basis.

calculation_of_price_allocation_for_POs.description: The transaction price is allocated among the performance obligations based on the relative standalone selling prices of each obligation.

standalone_prices_for_each_obligation.method_used_for_estimation: Estimated based on the complexity of the services and timeline for deliverables
standalone_prices_for_each_obligation.description: Standalone selling prices are not available for each performance obligation, but are estimated based on the complexity of the services and timeline for deliverables.

details.how_measured_performance: The squads are measured against the say-do ratio for each sprint, with a 10% minimum tolerance level.

payment_terms.name: Invoice at the end of each calendar month
payment_terms.description: Based on the capacity of the team

payment_terms.name: Withholding 5% of the invoice for the first month
payment_terms.description: If the team has met its obligations within 10% deviation

payment_terms.name: Payment of the full amount of invoice and the 5% from previous month
payment_terms.description: If the team has met its obligations within 10% deviation

payment_terms.name: Payment of the withheld amount upon completion of deliverables
payment_terms.description: If the team failed to deliver the agreed deliverables within the 10% deviation

for_PO_recognition_overtime_method_used_.basis_of_selecting_the_method: The input method is used to measure progress because it is a more accurate representation of the work completed.
